data.message: Hi,   I am CEO of media company, you have disabled fb account of my  co-worker,  how has enable ads on page.  Now  as I see from page statistics ads account work, but she can't login,  because you have disable her account.

replies.message: Hi Taron. Here are possible reasons why your co-worker's account may have been disabled: http://bit.ly/2sjYNtP. If your co-worker believes that it was disabled by mistake, they can submit an appeal in the link above. Thanks. -Jessica
Thanks for answer, we have appeal 10 more times, but  without  results. So, now in this account work ads manager and we  can't  disable it,  because you  have disable account.
